verses.verse: <S%H1288>Behold<s%>, bless you the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, all you <S%H5650>servants<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, which by <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H3027>hands<s%> in the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, and <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> you out of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.
